name: BARRACKPORE ANGEL INDIA FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Barrackpore Angel India Foundation is a registered NGO working for quality education of youth and children; Women Empowerment and for disabled persons. The poor, dismal and inadequate standard of most of our Government run rural/urban schools and primary educational institutions combining traditional, irrational and outdated teaching style lead the students to nowhere. The Right to Education is meaningless and just a mockery, if it is not the Right of Proper Education. Keeping this in mind, we run two projects aimed at bridging the gap and providing the  students and children an opportunity to lead their dream lives.URAAN:Uraan is a pilot project, which provides free coaching for preparation of WBJEE/Medical, Polytechnic and Competitive
